metadata.synopsis: Player picks up a mind flayer record, with some lore they pick up that telepathically flashes through their eyes. Other records already talk about humans, elves, dwarves, goblins, mindflayer history...This one could be about the nautiloid itself
metadata.how_to_trigger: Interact with tablet in TUT_Avernus_C in 3; 18; -412

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *A schematic of a nautiloid flashes into your mind. Nerves, sinews, as much living being as ship.*
